mapper.select: SELECT AREA_ID AS areaId, PROVINCE_ID AS provinceId FROM MD_PROVINCE WHERE PROVINCE_CODE=#{filterMap.provinceCode}
SELECT LGCS_AREA_ID AS lgcsAreaId, CITY_ID AS cityId FROM MD_CITY WHERE CITY_CODE=#{filterMap.cityCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sl_house_account ( SL_CODE, HOUSE_ACCOUNT, HOUSE_CODE, HOUSE_CODE_DIS, HOUSE_TEL, HOUSE_SHOW_NAME, HOUSE_CONTACT, ACCOUNT_PSD, AUTH_STATUS, SL_IDCARD, SL_CON_FLG, AREA_CODE, LGCS_AREA_CODE, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, DISTRICT_CODE, HOUSE_ADDRESS, V_AREA_CODE, V_LGCS_AREA_CODE, V_PROVINCE_CODE, V_CITY_CODE, V_DISTRICT_CODE, V_HOUSE_ADDRESS, LAT, LON, V_LAT, V_LON, LICENSES, BUYER_ASIGN, WECHAT, QQ, EMAIL, FIXED_TEL, FAX, FLAG20, FLAG19, FLAG18, FLAG17, FLAG16, FLAG15, FLAG14, FLAG13, FLAG12, FLAG11, FLAG10, FLAG9, FLAG8, FLAG7, FLAG6, FLAG5, FLAG4, FLAG3, FLAG2, FLAG1, HOUSE_INTRODUCE, HOUSE_CLASS, HOUSE_CATEGORY, HOUSE_CATEGORY0, HOUSE_CATEGORY1, HOUSE_CATEGORY2, HOUSE_CATEGORY3, HOUSE_CATEGORY4, HOUSE_CATEGORY5, HOUSE_CATEGORY6, HOUSE_CATEGORY7, HOUSE_CATEGORY8, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, VER ) VALUE ( #{slCode}, #{houseAccount}, #{houseCode}, #{houseCodeDis}, #{houseTel}, #{houseShowName}, #{houseContact}, #{accountPsd}, #{authStatus}, #{slIdcard}, #{slConFlg}, #{areaCode}, #{lgcsAreaCode}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{districtCode}, #{houseAddress}, #{vareaCode}, #{vlgcsAreaCode}, #{vprovinceCode}, #{vcityCode}, #{vdistrictCode}, #{vhouseAddress}, #{lat}, #{lon}, #{vlat}, #{vlon}, #{licenses}, #{buyerAsign}, #{wechat}, #{qq}, #{email}, #{fixedTel}, #{fax}, #{flag20}, #{flag19}, #{flag18}, #{flag17}, #{flag16}, #{flag15}, #{flag14}, #{flag13}, #{flag12}, #{flag11}, #{flag10}, #{flag9}, #{flag8}, #{flag7}, #{flag6}, #{flag5}, #{flag4}, #{flag3}, #{flag2}, #{flag1}, #{houseIntroduce}, #{houseClass}, #{houseCategory}, #{houseCategory0}, #{houseCategory1}, #{houseCategory2}, #{houseCategory3}, #{houseCategory4}, #{houseCategory5}, #{houseCategory6}, #{houseCategory7}, #{houseCategory8}, 0, #{crtId}, now(), #{ver} )
